segments.text: Hello , thanks for calling 123 Tech Help , I ’ m Todd . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello ? Can you help me ? My computer ! Oh man ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s okay sir , calm down . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I turned on my laptop and it broke ! I mean , the monitor went black !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , sir , it sounds like you might have a virus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t feel sick , ... let me check ... Nope ! No fever , I ’ m fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , your computer might have a virus , I mean , it has a bad program on it . Maybe that ’ s why it crashed . I recommend that you run an antivirus program in order to safely remove any unwanted spyware or Trojans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Phew ! . . . Wait a minute , CRASH ? ? ! ! Spyware ? Trojans ! What ? where ? when ? !
segments.speaker: S2
